title: Man, 76, remanded over 'drug-laced sweets' at summer camp - BBC News
analysis: The main headline of this BBC news article is "BBC News website gets new look." Key points from the article include the redesign of the BBC News website, the addition of new features, and the new design being more visually engaging. The summary is that the BBC News website has been updated with a new, redesigned look that includes enhanced features and a visually appealing user experience.
